name: AstroAce
description:
Challenge the cosmos with your skill and dexterity.
Plays like pinball but you must uncover the secrets hidden in the play field. No targets or bumpers are visible. Beware of the Black Hole and try to hit the Pulsars when they appear. Fun for all ages.

To play - hold and release plunger (lower right). Use flippers to keep ball in play (red buttons below flippers).

Features:

Realistic pinball action.

Scores are posted worldwide to Game Center.

Multi-ball play.

Compete against players all over the world (via Game Center Scoreboard).

Multiplayer (one shared device - up to 4 players).

Lots of lights and sounds.

Score multipliers and special effects.

Universal app (supports iPod touch, iPhone and iPad).

Purchase additional game credits within the game (via in app purchase).

Ten game plays for a single in-app purchase.

Ad free.

Like us on Facebook!

Support: support@bee-appy.com

Game credits have no value and are not transferable.

Contact us with any questions or suggestions. Your feedback helps us build better applications!
